hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The Last Hour will not come till wealth is abundant and overflowing, so much so that the owner of the property will think as to who will accept Sadaqa from him, and a person would be called to accept Sadaqa and he would say: I do not need it

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي الصَّدَقَةِ قَبْلَ أَنْ لاَ يُوجَدَ مَنْ يَقْبَلُهَا
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to give charity before there is no one to accept it
